channel.title: Management on Greg Herlein
channel.description: Recent content in Management on Greg Herlein

item.title: DevOps: Optimize for Cognitive Load
item.description: Speed, cost and quality are considered the vectors that you can control. Cognitive Load cuts across all of those. What do I mean?

item.title: Building Solution Architecture Teams - A Software Approach
item.description: What actually is Solution Architecture? How do you build and manage an Architecture team? Can you take a software approach to that?

item.title: Engineering Leadership 321
item.description: I’ve come to firmly believe that Engineering Leadership has a 3-2-1 principle to create Engineer happiness, which is a key prerequisite for high performance Engineering teams.
